original_title: Que la barque se brise, que la jonque s'entrouvre
overview: A telefilm that describes the meeting between Cambodian restaurateur Bopha ("flower"), a survivor of the genocide of the Khmer Rouge, and a Vietnamese man named Mihn, a "boat people" refugee who drives a taxi at night and works as a deliveryman during the day for his uncle's grocery store.
title: Que la barque se brise, que la jonque s'entrouvre
